update.summary: Added the class PropertyChangedEventArgs<T>.
update.comment: Added a new class PropertyChangedEventArgs<T> which extends the default PropertyChangedEventArgs-class and can be used to pass the old and new value of the changed property with the event.

update.summary: Added the base class Entity<TEntity> to provide a base implementation for entities.
update.comment: Added a new base class Entity<TEntity> which implements IEntity<TEntity> to provide a default implementation for the CopyFrom-method.

update.summary: Improved the behavior of the MemoryRepository class.
update.comment: Improved the behavior of the MemoryRepository class. It now better detects any changes that were made in entities from outside the repository and prevents them from being stored.

update.summary: Added overloads for the find-methods that take an expression directly.
update.comment: Added overloads for the find-methods that take an expression directly in order to make it even easier to use the repositories.

update.summary: Improved the behavior of the DatabaseRepository class.
update.comment: Improved the behavior of the DatabaseRepository class. It now better detects any changes that were made in entities from outside the repository and prevents them from being stored.

update.summary: Improved the behavior of the FileRepository class.
update.comment: Improved the behavior of the FileRepository class. It now better detects any changes that were made in entities from outside the repository and prevents them from being stored.

update.summary: The Logger can now directly be initialised.
update.comment: An instance of the Logger-class can now be directly initialised.

update.summary: Removed the dependency with the Enkoni.Framework.Logging project.
update.comment: The dependency with the Enkoni.Framework.Logging project (and thereby the dependency with the Enterprise Library Logging Application Block) has been removed. By default, logging is now done through the .NET tracing functionality.

update.summary: Added a new Between extension method
update.comment: Added a new Between extension method that can be used to determine if a DateTime value is between to other DateTime values.

update.summary: Added a new Truncate extension method
update.comment: Added a new Truncate extension method that can be used to truncate a string to a maximum length even if the string is shorter.

update.summary: Added a new XmlResourceResolver class
update.comment: Added a new XmlResourceResolver class that can be used to resolve xml schemas from embedded resources.

update.summary: Added new DateTimeProvider classes
update.comment: Added a DateTimeProvider, OffsetDateTimeProvider and FixedDateTimeProvider class that can be used to determine the current time and or date with support for dependency injection.

update.summary: Improved the SchemaValidationBehavior class
update.comment: Integrated the new XmlResourceResolver and added some extension points.

update.summary: Fixed a bug in the Capitalize and CapitalizeSentence extension methods
update.comment: Fixed a bug in the Capitalize and CapitalizeSentence extension methods that caused the methods to break when the input value either starts or ends with spaces or contains adjacent spaces.

update.summary: Added a new CapitalizeSentence extension method
update.comment: Added a new CapitalizeSentence extension method that can be used to capitalize the first word in a sentence and change the remaining words to lower case.

update.summary: Changed the behavior of the validations in case of an empty input value
update.comment: Empty input values are now accepted by the validators. In order to reject empty input values, combine the attributes with the default RequiredAttribute.

update.summary: Fixed a bug in the SubDomainModel class in the UpdateEntity method
update.comment: A bug in the UpdateEntity method of the SubDomainModel class prevented the abstract method UpdateEntityCore from being called in case the updated entity and the database entity where the same reference.

update.summary: Removed the dependency with the Enkoni.Framework.Validation-project and the Validation application block of the Microsoft Enterprise Library
update.comment: The EntityValidator now relies on System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations for the validation

update.summary: Added a new Reset method to the Repository class
update.comment: Added a new Reset method to the Repository class which can be used to revert any changes made to the repository.

update.summary: Added a new Execute method to the Repository class
update.comment: Added a new Execute method to the Repository class that can be used to execute custom actions that don't have to return one or more entities.

update.summary: Implemented the new Reset method of the Repository base class
update.comment: The DatabaseRepository implements the new Reset method which reverts any unsaved changes to the repository.

update.summary: Updated the reference to EntityFramework to version 6.1.0
update.comment: The project now references EntityFramework 6.1.0 (old version was 5.0).

update.summary: Implemented the new Reset method of the Repository base class
update.comment: The FileRepository implements the new Reset method which reverts any unsaved changes to the repository.

update.summary: Fixed a small bug that was left unfixed in the previous release with regards to the configuration logic of the DutchPhoneNumberValidator
update.comment: A small bug in the configuration logic of the DutchPhoneNumberValidator was overlokked in the previous release. This has been fixed now.

update.summary: Added the Enkoni.Framework.DataAnnotations-project
update.comment: Added the Enkoni.Framework.DataAnnotations-project which holds extensions to the DataAnnotations subsystem of Microsoft .Net. It basically is a copy of the existing Enkoni.Framework.Validation-project but without the dependency with the obsolete Validation Application Block of the Microsoft Enterprise Library.

update.summary: Fixed a bug when selecting an entity by ID
update.comment: Bug 12: When selecting an entity by its RecordId, an exception is thrown by Entity Framework. This has been fixed.

update.summary: Fixed a bug in the configuration logic when used in a web application
update.comment: Bug 14: When used in a web application the EmailValidator and DutchPhoneNumberValidator throws an exception because no exe-configuration file can be found. This has been fixed.

update.summary: Added the 'RequireTopLevelDomain' property to the EmailValidator
update.comment: The EmailValidator class now contains a new property called 'RequireTopLevelDomain' to indicate if an e-mail address must contain a top level domain in order to be valid

update.summary: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes
update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.summary: Added the EmailValidator class
update.comment: Added a new validator that is able to check if a string value represents a valid e-mail address. The validator can be instantiated directly or through an attribute and can be configured in code and in configuration.

update.summary: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes
update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.summary: Added support for a custom 'null' string to the CsvSerializer
update.comment: Added support for a custom 'null' string to the CsvSerializer. This allows for more flexibility when (de)serializing objects to and from CSV format.

update.summary: Upgraded to the .NET 4 framework
update.comment: The project now references the .NET 4 framework.

update.summary: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes
update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.summary: Upgraded to the .NET 4 framework
update.comment: The project now references the .NET 4 framework.

update.summary: Upgraded to the .NET 4 framework
update.comment: The project now references the .NET 4 framework.

update.summary: Upgraded to the .NET 4 framework
update.comment: The project now references the .NET 4 framework.

update.summary: Added the IbanValidator class
update.comment: Added a new validator that is able to check if a string value represents a valid IBAN account number.

update.summary: Added the DutchPhoneNumberValidator class
update.comment: Added a new validator that is able to check if a string value represents a valid Dutch phone number. The validator can be instantiated directly or through an attribute and can be configured in code and in configuration.

update.summary: Added the new Mvc3FixedModelBinder to the project
update.comment: Added the new Mvc3FixedModelBinder which extends Microsoft's DefaultModelBinder and fixes a bug related to binding enum-values.

update.summary: Added the Enkoni.Framework.Linq.Extensions.Distinct extension method.
update.comment: Added the Enkoni.Framework.Linq.Distinct extension method that can be used to return unique items from a IEnumerable<T> by comparing a specified field.

update.summary: Added support for more formats to the CsvSerializer
update.comment: The CsvSerializer now support more formats when (de)serializing classes.

update.summary: Added support to (de)serialize decimal and Enum values using the CsvSerializer
update.comment: The CsvSerializer class now supports (de)serialization of properties of type decimal and Enum.

update.summary: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes
update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.summary: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes
update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.summary: Fix a bug in the StopWatch class and improved pause and resume functionality
update.comment: Fixed a bug in the StopWatch-class that resulted in a laptime not being added to the collection of laptimes when the StopWatch was stopped. In addition, the StopWatch now has improved pausing and resuming functionality.

update.summary: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes
update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.summary: Changed the SafeClose-extension method to work on more WCF-related types.
update.comment: The SafeClose-extension method now works on objects of type ICommunicationObject which allows for a broader use of the functionality.

update.summary: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes
update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.summary: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes
update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.summary: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes
update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.summary: Added the Enkoni.Framework.Web project
update.comment: Added the Enkoni.Framework.Web project which contains classes that can be used within Web projects (WebForms and MVC).

update.summary: Reorganized some classes
update.comment: Reorganized some collection-related classes into a new namespace calles Enkoni.Framework.Collections. This is a breaking change but will add some more flexibility for the future.

update.summary: Added new timer related classes.
update.comment: - Added a new Stopwatch class that wraps the default .NET Stopwatch class and adds the ability to record lap times. - Added a new AlarmClock class is capable of triggering an event at a specific time of day.

update.summary: Added new functionality to compare double-values in a more confinient way.
update.comment: - Added new extension methods for System.Double to make it easier to compare double-values by looking only at the significant digits or a specified margin. - Added the new DoubleComparer and DoubleEqualityComparer classes to make it easier to compare double-values by looking only at the significant digits or a specified margin.

update.summary: Added new properties to the Workflow-class to determine if the workflow can be started, stopped, paused or continued.
update.comment: Added four new properties to the Workflow-class (CanStart, CanStop, CanPause, CanContinue) that can be used to determine if the workflow is in a state in which it can be started, stopped, paused or continued.

update.summary: Refreshed build as a result of version increment of Enkoni.Framework.
update.comment: The project has been rebuild to link against the new Enkoni.Framework library (2.0.0.0).

update.summary: Refreshed build as a result of version increment of Enkoni.Framework.Entities.
update.comment: The project has been rebuild to link against the new Enkoni.Framework.Entities library (2.0.0.0).

update.summary: Removed the obsolete CsvFileSourceInfo class
update.comment: Removed the obsolete CsvFileSourceInfo. Since this class was marked obsolete over a year ago and there is also a breaking change scheduled for the Enkoni.Framework project, this seemes like a good moment to remove this class.

update.summary: Refreshed build as a result of version increment of Enkoni.Framework.Entities.
update.comment: The project has been rebuild to link against the new Enkoni.Framework.Entities library (2.0.0.0).

update.summary: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes
update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.summary: Added the SchemaValidationBehavior class
update.comment: - Added the SchemaValidationMessageInspector and SchemaValidationBehaviorExtensionElement classes that can be used to validate sent and received messages against an XML schema.

update.summary: Removed the FlatWsdlBehavior classes
update.comment: - Removed the FlatWsdlBehaviorExtensionElement and FlatWsdlBehaviorAttribute classes. The functionality did not always behave as expected. Since .Net 4.5 has build-in support for generating a single WSDL file, this functionality is no longer required and therefore it was removed from this framework. When using .NET 4.5, it is recommended to use the new ?singlewsdl quierystring. When using an earlier version of .NET, it is recommended to use the single WSDL functionality provided by the WCFExtras-library which can be found at http://wcfextras.codeplex.com.

update.summary: Removed the DisposableServiceBehaviorAttribute class
update.comment: - New understanding of the WCF framework and more extensive unit testing learned that the disposable service behavior has been quite useless from the beginning. If the service implementation needs disposing, use a bindingtype and behavior that supports sessions. That way, the .NET ecosystem will automatically call the Dispose method upon session ending or channel faulting.

update.summary: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes
update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.summary: Fixed a bug in the EnumHelper.ToString() method
update.comment: Fixed a bug in the EnumHelper.ToString() method that could cause an exception if no resource was specified in combination with the LocalizedDescriptionAttribute.

update.summary: Added support for the EnumMemberAttribute in the EnumHelper.ToString() method
update.comment: The EnumHelper.ToString() now also supports the EnumMemberAttribute when trying to transform an enum to a string.

update.summary: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes
update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.summary: Added new classes and methods
update.comment: - Added the LocalizedDescriptionAttribute-class that can be used to define a localizable description for a type or member. - Added the EnumHelper class that contains methods that help when dealing with enums. - Added additional extension methods for the Type class.

update.summary: Refreshed build as a result of version increment of Enkoni.Framework
update.comment: The project has been rebuild to link against the new Enkoni.Framework library (1.2.0.0)

update.summary: Updated the reference to Unity to 2.1.505.2
update.comment: Updated the reference to Unity 2.1.505.2

update.summary: Updated the reference to EntityFramework to 5.0.0
update.comment: The project now uses version 5.0.0 of the EntityFramework. There are no API changes.

update.summary: Refreshed build as a result of version increment of Enkoni.Framework
update.comment: The project has been rebuild to link against the new Enkoni.Framework library (1.2.0.0)

update.summary: Refreshed build as a result of version increment of Enkoni.Framework
update.comment: The project has been rebuild to link against the new Enkoni.Framework library (1.2.0.0)

update.summary: Refreshed build as a result of version increment of Enkoni.Framework
update.comment: The project has been rebuild to link against the new Enkoni.Framework library (1.2.0.0)

update.summary: Updated the reference to Unity 2.1.505.2
update.comment: Updated the reference to Unity 2.1.505.2

update.summary: Added the FlatWsdlBehavior class
update.comment: - Added the FlatWsdlBehaviorAttribute and FlatWsdlBehaviorExtensionElement classes that can be used to produce a flattend WSL-document.

update.summary: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes
update.comment: Updated the AssemblyInformationalVersion. No API changes

update.summary: Added the Enkoni.Framework.UI project
update.comment: Added the Enkoni.Framework.UI project which contains classes that can be used within UI projects (WinForms and WPF).

update.summary: Updated the reference to Unity to 2.1.505.2
update.comment: Updated the reference to Unity to 2.1.505.2

update.summary: Updated the reference to EntityFramework to 4.2.0.0
update.comment: The project now uses version 4.2 of the EntityFramework. There are no API changes.

update.summary: Fixed an issue with the Enkoni.Framework.Linq.Extensions.Capitalize() methods.
update.comment: The Enkoni.Framework.Linq.Extensions.Capitalize methods caused an InvalidOperationException when called with an empty (not null) string. This has now been fixed.

update.summary: Added the Enkoni.Framework.Linq.Extensions.CreateEqualityComparer extension method.
update.comment: Added the Enkoni.Framework.Linq.CreateEqualityComparer extension method that can be used to create an IEqualityComparer using the signature of an IEnumerable<T>. This method is particular usefull for collections of anonymous types.

update.summary: Added the CircularStack<T> class.
update.comment: Added the CircularStack<T> class that can be used as a normal stack except that is will overwrite the oldest value once a preset maximum has been reached.

update.summary: Added the Serializer<T>, Transformer<T> and CsvTransformer<T> classes.
update.comment: Added three classes that aid in (de)serializing objects. Also the existing CsvSerializer class has been updated to make use of these new classes. By using this new architecture, the serialization classes are more flexible for future extensions and other developments.

update.summary: Added support for asynchronous operations to the Serializer class.
update.comment: Added support for asynchronous (de)serialization.

update.summary: Added the ability to add, update and delete a collection of entities in the repository.
update.comment: The Repository class now has the ability to add, update or delete a collection of entities in the repository. It provides a default implementation which can be overwritten in specific implementations of the repository.

update.summary: Improved overall performance and stability of the MemoryRepository class.
update.comment: The MemoryRepository class has been rewritten to improve the performance and stability of the implementation.

update.summary: Added an extra flag called 'clone data source items' to the DataSourceInfo class.
update.comment: The DataSourceInfo class can now specify wheter or not an entity that originates from a datasource, must be cloned before it is returned or not.

update.summary: Added support for Encoding to the FileSourceInfo class.
update.comment: The FileSourceInfo class can now also specify the encoding of a file that is handled by one of the repositories.

update.summary: Marked the CsvFileSourceInfo obsolete.
update.comment: Since the FileSourceInfo class now has build-in support to specify the required file encoding, the CsvFileSourceInfo class no longer has any added value. Therefore, the class is marked obsolete. This type may be completely removed in a future release.

update.summary: XmlFileRepository now supports different file encodings.
update.comment: It is now possible to specify a specific file encoding for the XML-file that is used by the XmlFileRepository.

update.summary: Improved overall performance and stability of the FileRepository class.
update.comment: The FileRepository class has been rewritten to improve the performance and stability of the implementation.

update.summary: Improved overall performance and stability of the DatabaseRepository class.
update.comment: The DatabaseRepository class has been rewritten to improve the performance and stability of the implementation. It also supports transactions now.

update.summary: Refreshed build as a result of version increment of Enkoni.Framework.Entities.
update.comment: The project has been rebuild to link against the new Enkoni.Framework.Entities library (1.3.0.0).

release.remark: This is a maintainance release. No API or functional changes have been made.

update.summary: Updated the reference to EnterpriseLibrary.Validation to 5.0.505.0.
update.comment: The project now references the EnterpriseLibrary libraries through the NuGet system.

update.summary: Refreshed build as a result of version increment of Enkoni.Framework.Entities.
update.comment: The project has been rebuild to link against the new Enkoni.Framework.Entities library (1.2.0.0).

update.summary: Refreshed build as a result of version increment of Enkoni.Framework.Entities.
update.comment: The project has been rebuild to link against the new Enkoni.Framework.Entities library (1.2.0.0).

update.summary: Refreshed build as a result of version increment of Enkoni.Framework.Entities.
update.comment: The project has been rebuild to link against the new Enkoni.Framework.Entities library (1.2.0.0).

update.summary: Updated the reference to EnterpriseLibrary.Logging to 5.0.505.0.
update.comment: The project now references the EnterpriseLibrary libraries through the NuGet system.

update.summary: Refreshed build as a result of version increment of Enkoni.Framework.Logging.
update.comment: The project has been rebuild to link against the new Enkoni.Framework.Logging library (1.1.0.0).

update.summary: Updated the reference to EnterpriseLibrary.Validation to 5.0.505.0
update.comment: The project now references the EnterpriseLibrary libraries through the NuGet system. There are no API changes.

update.summary: Updated the reference to EntityFramework.dll to version 4.1 Final (4.1.0.0).
update.comment: The project now uses version 4.1 Final of the EntityFramework. There are no API changes.

update.summary: Fixed a bug in the CsvSerializer.
update.comment: Fixed a bug that in specific circumstances caused an exception when serializing an object using explicit formatting.

update.summary: Added a virtual FindEntityByIdCore method to the abstract SubDomainModel class.
update.comment: The default implementation of the FindEntityById method of SubDomainModel does not work with some datasources (like SQL Server 2008). Therefore, a protected virtual method called FindEntityByIdCore method has been added. By default this method works just as the previous releases. Override this method in case you experience some unexpected problems with your datasource.

update.summary: Updated the reference to EntityFramework.dll to version 4.1RC.
update.comment: The project now uses version 4.1RC of the EntityFramework. There are no API changes.

release.remark: Renamed the framework to the Enkoni framework. This marks a new phase in the development and usage of this product. The versionnumber has been reset to 1.0.0.0 and the release notes are cleared. The previous release notes and releases are available through the source control system.

update.summary: Added an extension method for the DateTime struct.
update.comment: Added an extension method which can be used to determine the weeknumber of any given date in accordance with the ISO 8601 specification.

update.summary: Splitted the Enkoni.Framework.Entities project into four seperate projects.
update.comment: Splitted the Enkoni.Framework.Entities into four seperate projects. Enkoni.Framework.Entities contains the general data-access classes, Enkoni.Framework.Entities.Database contains the classes use a database as datasource for the data-access, Enkoni.Framework.Entities.File contains classes that use a file as datasource for the data-access, Enkoni.Framework.Entities.Service contains classes that use a WCF service as datasource for the data-access. By splitting these classes into seperate projects, developers no longer need to include WCF-related libraries when they only want to use a database or include database-related libraries when they only want to use a filebased datasource. The memory-based data-access classes are still a part of the Enkoni.Framework.Entities project since they don't require any additional and/or memory-specific libraries nor is it to be expected that they will need to in the future.

update.summary: Added the Enkoni.Framework.Logging project.
update.comment: Added the Enkoni.Framework.Logging project which contains classes that can be used to emit logmessages using the Logging Application Block which is part of the Microsoft Enterprise Library.
